These are budget friendly, dress shoes. They fit true to size and are relatively comfortable (for dress shoes). The construction is what you’d expect for shoes at this advertised price. The material feels synthetic; I find the coloring somewhat odd, as the material looks more “printed” than a natural coloring. I don’t think this is noticeable when you’re wearing them.  All things considered, these shoes are fine. Personally, I’m in dress shoes daily and if I can get a year out of these, I’d be satisfied. If you’re in the market for an inexpensive pair of dress shoes, and these are on sale or with a coupon, they’re worth a shot. Otherwise, I think you can easily find comparable shoes for roughly the same price at any big box retailer.

评论概述: Meijiana Men's Oxfords Luxury Oxford Shoes for Men Business Casual Shoes Men's Lace-up
评论详情: These Meijiana Men's Oxfords Luxury Oxford Shoes for Men Business Casual Shoes Men's Lace-up are a really nice dressy sexy shoes that pair well with a business suit, casual look, jeans or casual dress slacks. It would have been even better if you could have acquired these shoes in 1/2 size larger for those of us with wide feet. They fit not too snug and I was able to walk in them a full day without any foot pain.  While this is not a leather upper or leather sole it does not take away from them being a stylish pair of shoes. The seller offers the shoe in other styles and patterns its a solid show that received multiple compliments. I'd have to say with the given price point its an affordable attractive shoe that I'd purchase in the other styles. I'd recommend them for an affordable stylish shoe  they are not uncomfortable even for me with wider feet I was able to walk in these , wear them a full day with no noticeable problems or uncomfortable issues I'd give these shoes a 5- Star review.

评论概述: Bargain-priced show that looks and feels great
评论详情: I wear dress shoes to work every day and I am pretty hard on them so I generally don't buy expensive shoes.  So I have become kind of an expert at buying shoes that look like $100-plus but cost a lot less.  These shoes fit in that catagory and they fulfill my needs perfectly.  FIrst of all, the fit is just right.  I like a 10.5 but I like to have room for ocassionally thicker socks so the 11 worked perfectly for me. You really cannot tell that they are not real leather unless you touch them with your hand, and they are nice and durable faux leather (plastic).  I do find that they breath very well also---that is, my feet do not sweat in them, even on hot days.  FInally, they are quite comfortable....similar to a comfort walking shoe.  I'd never wear these for hiking, but comfort-wise, I certainly could!  If you are looking for a decent show that does not break the bank, these are the ones to buy.
